description: Schema specific to Services (MAS or DiSSCover) providing information to DiSSCo's annotation processing service.

jobId.description: Handle of the job record, if the annotation was produced by a Machine Annotation Service

annotations.description: List of annotations produced by the MAS

batchMetadata.description: Object containing batch information, if result is a batch

batchId.description: ID of batch operation. Generated by DiSSCo
